text: Box of Chameleons is a three-disc compilation album by American experimental rock band Sun City Girls, released in 1997 by Abduction Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Adapted from the Box of Chameleons liner notes. ;Sun City Girls * Alan Bishop – bass guitar, vocals * Richard Bishop – guitar, vocals * Charles Gocher – drums, percussion, vocals ;Production and additional personnel * Scott Colburn – recording, editing * Wade Olson – recording * Manford Cain – recording * Sun City Girls – musical arrangement, production, recording ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format !
